price: 82. Dan, als zij zich afkeren, is jouw taak slechts om de boodschap duidelijk te verkondigen.
arabic: فَإِن تَوَلَّوۡاْ فَإِنَّمَا عَلَيۡكَ ٱلۡبَلَٰغُ ٱلۡمُبِينُ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: fa-in tawallaw fa-innamā ʿalayka al-balāghu al-mubīnu
